OOC: Nice... I get to have opinions again since i don't have to worry about being fair anymore!  I've got all this angst stored up and I think I'll let some of it out now.  

Listen here Hollywood.  This is... actually I've lost count... but the third or fourth time in the last sixth months you've said something to the effect of "Nobody likes me so I'm leaving and never coming back."  While I'm sure some people like you, I don't.  and frankly I couldn't care less if you left.  That said, it'll be fun to welcome you back in a couple of weeks again.  (call me a masochist but I do enjoy listening to you whine... it makes me feel so much better about myself)

That was fun... I can just feel the angst lifting.


---------------------------------

--0-1558477676-1055525769=:30500

<P>OOC: Nice... I get to have opinions again since i don't have to worry about being fair anymore!  I've got all this angst stored up and I think I'll let some of it out now.  </P>
<P>Listen here Hollywood.  This is... actually I've lost count... but the third or fourth time in the last sixth months you've said something to the effect of "Nobody likes me so I'm leaving and never coming back."  While I'm sure some people like you, I don't.  and frankly I couldn't care less if you left.  That said, it'll be fun to welcome you back in a couple of weeks again.  (call me a masochist but I do enjoy listening to you whine... it makes me feel so much better about myself)</P>
<P>That was fun... I can just feel the angst lifting.</P><p><hr SIZE=1>
